name: fix
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: They couldn't fix my old computer, so I bought a new one.
example.egtrans: 他们修不好我的旧电脑了，所以我买了台新的。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to arrange or agree a time, place, price, etc.
trans_examp.trans_cn: 安排，确定（时间、地点、价格等）

example.eg: Shall we fix a time for our next meeting?
example.egtrans: 我们确定一下下次会议的时间吧？

example.eg: I understand the rent is fixed at £750 a month.
example.egtrans: 我听说租金定为每月750英镑。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to fasten something in position so that it cannot move

example.eg: We fixed the bookcase to the wall.
example.egtrans: 我们把书架固定在墙上。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to keep something or someone in sight

example.eg: His eyes were fixed on the distant yacht.
example.egtrans: 他双眼凝视着远处的游艇。

example.eg: She fixed the child with a stare of such disapproval he did not dare move.
example.egtrans: 她用责难的眼光紧盯着那个孩子，吓得他一动也不敢动。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to continue to think about or remember something

example.eg: It is somehow fixed in my mind that my fate and that woman's are intertwined.
example.egtrans: 我和那个女人的命运已经交织在一起了，这个想法在我脑海挥之不去。

example.eg: She was so frightened that she could not fix her thoughts on anything.
example.egtrans: 她害怕得大脑一片混乱，根本甚么也想不清楚。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to do something dishonest to make certain that a competition, race, or election is won by a particular person
trans_examp.trans_cn: 操纵；在（比赛或选举）中作弊

example.eg: Several jockeys were arrested on suspicion of fixing the race.
example.egtrans: 几名骑师因涉嫌在比赛中作弊而被捕。

example.eg: It sounds like the election was fixed.
example.egtrans: 听起来好像有人操纵这次选举。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make your hair, make-up, clothes, etc. look tidy
trans_examp.trans_cn: 梳洗，整理（头发、容妆、衣服等）

example.eg: Give me a couple of minutes while I fix my hair.
example.egtrans: 给我几分钟时间整理一下头发。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to cook or prepare food or drink

example.eg: Whose turn is it to fix dinner?
example.egtrans: 轮到谁做晚饭了？

example.eg: Can I fix you a drink?/Can I fix a drink for you?
example.egtrans: 我给你倒杯饮料好吗？

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to punish especially someone who has been unfair
trans_examp.trans_cn: 惩罚，收拾（尤指待人不公者）

example.eg: I'm gonna fix her if she doesn't stop telling lies about me!
example.egtrans: 如果她还在不停地造我的谣，我就打算收拾她了！

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to treat something, especially photographic material, with chemicals to prevent its colours becoming pale

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to remove the reproductive organs of an animal so that it is unable to produce young animals

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to inject (= put into the body through a needle) an illegal drug

example.eg: We saw kids as young as twelve fixing in doorways.
example.egtrans: 我们看见门口那些年仅12岁的孩子在注射毒品。

name: fix
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a situation in which someone does something dishonest to make certain that a competition, race, or election is won by a particular person
trans_examp.trans_cn: 操纵；在（比赛或选举）中作弊

example.eg: The result was a fix!
example.egtrans: 结果是早就定好了的！

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: I'm in a bit of a fix with the arrangements.
example.egtrans: 这样的安排让我陷入了窘境。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an amount of an illegal drug, or of another substance that has an effect on someone

example.eg: He was shaking badly and needed a fix.
example.egtrans: 他抖得很厉害，需要一剂毒品。

example.eg: Ginny needs her daily fix of chocolate.
example.egtrans: 金妮每天不吃巧克力就过不去。

dsense.name: fix
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: (the calculation of) the position of a vehicle, usually in relation to the earth

example.eg: Do we still have a fix on that jet?
example.egtrans: 那架喷气机的方位我们还能确定吗？
